trans-unit.source: Represents the data context of the current workflow environment and provides a bridge to bring workflow arguments and variables into the scope of Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) data binding.
trans-unit.target: Representa o contexto de dados do ambiente do fluxo de trabalho atual e fornece uma ponte para levar os argumentos e as variáveis do fluxo de trabalho para escopo da associação de dados do WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation).

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" />.
Returns the collection of properties managed by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de propriedades gerenciadas por esse <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of properties managed by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de propriedades gerenciadas por esse <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um valor de propriedade é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext.PropertyChanged> event can indicate all properties on the object have changed by using either `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the property name in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext.PropertyChanged> evento pode indicar a todas as propriedades do objeto foram alterados usando `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) ou <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> como o nome da propriedade a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>.
